summary: A presenter, or host / hostess, is a person who guides or introduces an event, especially on television.
full_text: A presenter host or hostess is a person or organization responsible for the running of a public event. A museum or university, for example, may be the presenter or host of an exhibit. In films, a presenter  is a usually a well-known executive producer credited with introducing a film or filmmaker to a larger audience. For example: "Presented by Cecil B. DeMille".
title: Presenter
